auth.loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account

home.title: InovaSprint
home.subtitle: Comprehensive platform for managing high school ideathons and hackathons
home.signInDescription: Sign in according to your role
home.studentInfo: Students: Scan your team's QR code to join directly
home.footer: This application was developed by the R&D Unit of Bursa Provincial Directorate of National Education using the vibe coding method.

bulkCreate.title: Quick Setup: Create Multiple Teams
bulkCreate.description: Perfect for hackathon preparation - create all tables at once
bulkCreate.infoText: Teams will be named "Table 1", "Table 2", etc. Students will choose their own team names.
bulkCreate.errorRange: Please enter a number between 1 and 50
bulkCreate.confirmExisting: This event already has {count} teams. Creating {newCount} more teams will add to the existing ones. Continue?
bulkCreate.errorCreate: Failed to create teams. Please try again.

teamsList.title: Teams
teamsList.noTeams: No teams yet. Create your first team above.

qrDialog.allCodesTitle: All Team Activation Codes & QR Codes
qrDialog.allCodesDescription: Print and place these at each table. Students can either scan QR or enter the code.
qrDialog.joinDescription: Scan this QR code to join the team

pitchControl.title: Pitch Control
pitchControl.description: Select a team and start their pitch timer

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.description: Final scores combine jury scores (70%) and student investments (30%)
leaderboard.noScores: No scores yet. Wait for jury scoring and student voting.

topInvestors.title: Top Investors
topInvestors.description: Students who made the smartest investments in winning teams (3x for 1st, 2x for 2nd, 1x for 3rd)
topInvestors.noInvestments: No investments yet. Wait for students to invest in teams during the voting phase.

mentorManagement.title: Mentor Management
mentorManagement.description: Create mentors and assign them to teams
mentorManagement.noTeamsAvailable: No teams available. Create teams first.
mentorManagement.credentialsDescription: Save these credentials and share them with the mentor securely.
mentorManagement.credentialsWarning: ⚠️ Important: This password will not be shown again. Copy it now and share it with the mentor securely.

student.waitingForEvent: Waiting for the event to start...
student.waitingMessage: The admin will start the ideation phase soon. Get ready to work on your canvas!
student.canvasDescription: Each team member can add their ideas • All contributions are visible to everyone
student.shareActivationCode: Share your activation code with teammates:
student.thankYouParticipation: Thank you for participating! Results will be announced soon.

portfolioVoting.title: Portfolio Voting
portfolioVoting.distribute: Distribute your {amount} idecoin among the teams you believe in
portfolioVoting.thankYou: Thank you for voting. Your investments have been recorded.
portfolioVoting.errorMax: You can't allocate more than {amount} idecoin

canvas.problemPlaceholder: Describe the main problem your target audience faces...
canvas.solutionPlaceholder: Explain your solution and how it addresses the problem...
canvas.uniqueValuePlaceholder: What makes your solution unique and better than alternatives?
canvas.targetAudiencePlaceholder: Describe your ideal customers, their demographics, and behaviors...
canvas.keyFeaturesPlaceholder: List your top 3 key features that deliver the most value...
canvas.revenueModelPlaceholder: Explain how you will make money from your solution...

notes.title: My Notes
notes.description: Take notes while evaluating other teams

jury.waitingForPitch: The admin needs to select a team and start their pitch timer in the Pitch Control panel.
jury.waitingForPhase: Waiting for the pitching phase to begin...
jury.pitchingPhaseInfo: The event is in pitching phase but no team is currently presenting. The admin can select a team from the Pitch Control panel to begin.

scoring.title: Score Team
scoring.innovationDesc: How innovative and creative is the idea?
scoring.feasibilityDesc: How realistic and implementable is the solution?

mentor.waitForAssignment: Wait for admin to assign you to teams

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action
